sourcesContent:
import React ,{useState} from "react"; import './ExpenseForm.css' export const ExpenseForm = () => { const [newexpenses,setnewexpenses] = useState({ Title :'', Amount :0, Date : null }) const titleChangeHandler = (event) => { setnewexpenses(...newexpenses, newexpenses.Title=event.target.value) } const amountChangeHandler = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value) setnewexpenses(...newexpenses, newexpenses.Amount=event.target.value) } const dateChangeHandler = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value) setnewexpenses(...newexpenses, newexpenses.Date=event.target.value) } return
} export default ExpenseForm;
